message.body: I'm sorry I missed you yesterday! The last few days have got away from me
It's ok sweets, I wouldn't have been very pleasant anyways. #transitions #lifefeelsbetterinspanish harlem. How was turkey? Feel good to be home?

Oh were you sad to go back? New ulm is so comfortable.... I was just talking about that today. In having a hard time focusing having not been there for the holiday. My holiday was ok... I got sick! But Boston was great.
Actually the opposite - it's only comfortable when I had the house to myself for the whole day. It's really hard for me to find flow with family and the communi
Ty and then I got in a fight with my dad. So it feels better just staying here to be honest. But the IDEA of nu is comforting - just changes everytime I go
Yea, it's not about flow really just it being a bubble. I know what you mean. What were you fighting with your dad about?
About how I'm discontent with our relationship but then it just got hurtful - It just didn't end very well and it felt really isolating. I talked to tyler and
Brett about it and I'm feeling better about everything. I think at this point we're all going through that adjustment with our rents :)
I'm sorry, pat. It is that time in our life but you don't deserve to be hurt.
It's good to hear that because so often I feel like I have to fight to prove my own pain because they think it's incomprehensible since I had such a nice
Upbringing. But what he failed to recognize is that I'm discontent with the present, not the past. Life life life
Yea, feelings are valid etc :) maybe it'll sink in later. How did you leave it?
There wasn't really closure - I just kinda withdrew. He called today to apologize. The space and time has already did me good :)
